resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Configure one external integration/channel and verify sync state + external id linkage is persisted.
data.expectedResult: Connector installation/configuration and sync status are queryable for operational debugging.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.
